has research problem: Emotion Recognition in Dyadic Dialogue Videos

has research problem.from sentence: Conversational Memory Network for Emotion Recognition in Dyadic Dialogue Videos
Emotion recognition in conversations is crucial for the development of empathetic machines .

has research problem: emotion detection in videos of dyadic conversations

has research problem.from sentence: In this paper , we analyze emotion detection in videos of dyadic conversations .
Emotion detection from such resources can benefit numerous fields like counseling , public opinion mining , financial forecasting , and intelligent systems such as smart homes and chatbots .
